data.short_description: Notification (1) doesn't disappears after leaving a dm group voice chat and turning the phone into stand-by and after
data.steps_to_repro: - Be in a dm group voice chat - Chat with someone and don't read his last sent message - Leave the Voice Channel and close the discord tab and turn your phone into stand-by and on again - Open discord and click the message - After reading click "Close Chat"
